statements: SELECT * FROM DiseaseOutbreaks;
SELECT disease_name, location, reported_cases FROM DiseaseOutbreaks;
SELECT outbreak_id, disease_name, reported_deaths FROM DiseaseOutbreaks WHERE reported_cases > 100;
SELECT outbreak_id, location FROM DiseaseOutbreaks WHERE date_reported BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM DiseaseOutbreaks WHERE disease_name = 'Ebola' ORDER BY reported_deaths DESC;
SELECT outbreak_id, disease_name, location, reported_cases, reported_deaths, date_reported FROM DiseaseOutbreaks;
SELECT outbreak_id, disease_name, location, reported_cases, reported_deaths, date_reported FROM DiseaseOutbreaks ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT outbreak_id, disease_name, location, reported_cases, reported_deaths, date_reported FROM DiseaseOutbreaks WHERE reported_cases > 100;
SELECT outbreak_id, disease_name, location, reported_cases, reported_deaths, date_reported FROM DiseaseOutbreaks WHERE disease_name LIKE '%flu%';
SELECT outbreak_id, disease_name, location, reported_cases, reported_deaths, date_reported FROM DiseaseOutbreaks ORDER BY reported_cases DESC, reported_deaths ASC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM Patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT disease_name FROM Outbreaks WHERE location = 'City A';
SELECT outbreak_id, disease_name, outbreak_date FROM Outbreaks WHERE affected_population > 1000;
SELECT patient_name, address FROM Patients WHERE age >= 50;
SELECT patient_name, age, address FROM Patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE disease_history IS NOT NULL;
SELECT patient_name, disease_name FROM Patients JOIN Outbreaks ON Patients.disease_history = Outbreaks.disease_name;
SELECT outbreak_date, location, affected_population FROM Outbreaks ORDER BY outbreak_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM Patients WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT * FROM HealthCareProvider;
SELECT provider_name, location FROM HealthCareProvider ORDER BY provider_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patient WHERE age > 30;
SELECT outbreak_id, disease_name, outbreak_date FROM DiseaseOutbreak WHERE affected_patients > 100 ORDER BY outbreak_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM DiseaseOutbreak WHERE disease_name LIKE 'Influenza%';
SELECT * FROM HealthCareProvider;
SELECT provider_name, location FROM HealthCareProvider ORDER BY provider_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patient WHERE gender='Male' AND age>30;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patient WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40;
SELECT DISTINCT disease_name FROM DiseaseOutbreak WHERE affected_patients > 10;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT name, age, diagnosis_date FROM patients JOIN diagnoses ON patients.patient_id = diagnoses.patient_id;
SELECT patient_id, name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 40;
SELECT disease, COUNT(*) AS total_cases FROM diagnoses GROUP BY disease;
SELECT treatment_id, treatment_name, treatment_date FROM treatments ORDER BY treatment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Male';
SELECT disease, COUNT(patient_id) AS patient_count FROM diagnoses GROUP BY disease HAVING patient_count > 2 ORDER BY patient_count DESC;

SELECT p.name, d.diagnosis_date, t.treatment_name FROM patients p JOIN diagnoses d ON p.patient_id = d.patient_id JOIN treatments t ON p.patient_id = t.patient_id WHERE p.age BETWEEN 20 AND 40 ORDER BY d.diagnosis_date DESC;
SELECT o.disease, o.start_date, o.end_date, o.affected_patients, p.name FROM outbreaks o JOIN patients p ON o.disease = p.disease WHERE o.start_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY o.start_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Patients
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_age DESC
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, patient_location FROM Patients WHERE patient_gender='Female'
SELECT hospital_name, hospital_location, hospital_capacity FROM Hospitals WHERE hospital_capacity > 100
SELECT disease_name, disease_symptoms FROM Diseases
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT hospital_name, hospital_location, hospital_capacity FROM Hospitals ORDER BY hospital_capacity DESC;
SELECT disease_name, disease_symptoms FROM Diseases WHERE disease_mortality_rate > 0.1;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, patient_location FROM Patients WHERE patient_age BETWEEN 20 AND 40;
SELECT MAX(affected_population) AS max_affected_population, MIN(affected_population) AS min_affected_population FROM Outbreaks;
